name: Hide Price Until Login
author: CedCommerce

sections.description:
Hide Price of the products on shop and product detail page until user is not logged in or until password is entered.

Main features

  • Hides the product’s price until the correct password is entered
  • Hides the product’s price for specific users
  • Hides the product’s price until the user is logged in
  • Hides price from shop page and product detail page as well
  • Hides the product’s price for none
  • At shop page only the details of a prodcut is shown, either it is a simple product.
  • Full customizable, most of the things are dynamic and can be customized by admin.
  • Enable/Disable all the features of plugin
  • Efficient for valid user only.
  • Easy to use and install
  • Easy to configure
  • Show/Hide password field.
  • Excellent language support

sections.installation:
Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option as WordPress handles the file transfers itself and you don’t need to leave your web browser. To do an automatic install of Hide Price Until Login, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.

In the search field type “Hide Price Until Login” and click Search Plugins. Once you’ve found our Hide Price Until Login plugin you can view details about it such as the point release, rating and description. Most importantly of course, you can install it by simply clicking “Install Now”.

Manual installation

The manual installation method involves downloading our Hide Price Until Login plugin and uploading it to your webserver via your favourite FTP application. The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to do this here.
sections.faq:
What is Hide Price Until Login ?

Hide Price Until Login is a solution for the vendors to make their shop for valid users only.
sections.changelog:
= 1.1.1=
* Bugs Fixed, Added instant chat support feature, Design enhancement and WooCommerce Compatibilty

= 1.1.0=
* Bugs Fixed, Design enhancement and WooCommerce Compatibilty

= 1.0.12=
* Bugs Fixed, Design enhancement and WooCommerce Compatibilty

= 1.0.11=
* Bugs Fixed, Design enhancement and WooCommerce Compatibilty

= 1.0.10=
* Bugs Fixed and WooCommerce Compatibilty

1.0.9

  • Bugs Fixed

1.0.8

  • Modified the user role feature, Now the selected user roles can see the price after logged in

1.0.7

  • Js issues fix
  • Compatible with lower versions of PHP

1.0.6

  • Captcha added in registration form.
  • Feature for custom form is added.
  • Hide price for email in cutomer order.
  • Registration form can be shown now only at specific pages and all pages also.

1.0.5

  • Fixed issue of not showing the total and subtotal on condition fulfilment
  • Plugin admin setting for hide price based on selected user role.
  • Plugin admin setting for hide price for none.

1.0.4

  • Fixed issue of hiding the content written on shop page

1.0.3

  • Fixed issue of language compatibility
  • Fixed issue of login popup not showing on mobile view

1.0.2

  • Fixed issue of fatal error

1.0.1

  • Fixed issue of tax hide

1.0.0

  • It is the initial version of this plugin.
